meanings.definition: A woman who is sexually attracted to other women.
meanings.sent1: Some lesbians enjoy going on dates with other women.
meanings.sent2: I have a few friends who are lesbians and they are in happy relationships.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the lesbians were the best dancers on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two lesbians was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the love story of two lesbians beautifully.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to homosexual women.
meanings.sent1: She wore a t-shirt with a lesbians pride flag on it.
meanings.sent2: The lesbians community came together to support each other during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The store had a section dedicated to lesbians fashion.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated with posters of famous lesbians activists.
meanings.sent5: The book explored the history of lesbians rights movements.
